attributes.action: Treat Under 18's in Employment be treated Equally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under 18's who are in Full Time Employment should be treated Equally, this includes but is not limited to;
*Fair pay.
*Employee Benefits. 

People who do the same job should not be limited in their work, and should get fair pay. 
Under 18's who are in Full Time Employment likely have bills to pay, rent to pay, travel expenses and also food shopping to buy. Pay tax, and struggle to live.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
